name: Bob Block Demo
description:
Bob Block Demo is a demo of my first Unity project that I am working on. Bob Block is a 3D, fixed camera platformer where you control a cube through various levels. Currently there is one world consisting of 3 short levels.  

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Space to jump/double jump

- Escape to exit at anytime

Enjoy and add any recommendations in the comments!
